arStrings.szText: After {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds of Night's Grasp, gain Dawn's Haste, increasing your Attack Speed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} and Movement Speed by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 3"]%{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. While empowered by the {c_important}Midwinter Ward{/c}, killing an enemy reduces Night's Grasp's duration by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} second.
